entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Shell.CurrentState` doesn't match `Shell.CurrentPage` when `Page.NavigatedTo` is called using a relative route #29428
  • DidReceiveRemoteNotification not called on CloudKit changes (iOS) #29427
  • Value attribute isn't valid XAML syntax but doesn't produce error #29422
    Backlog
  • [Windows] KeepScrollOffset Not Working as Expected in CarouselView #29421
    Backlog
  • [Windows] KeepLastItemInView Behavior Not Working as Expected in CarouselView #29420
    Backlog
  • Bug Report: App crashes when drawing text on pointer pressed in GraphicsView (Windows) #29418
    Backlog
  • Initial Errors on code #29417
  • Tooltip Delay and Tooltip Duration Settings #29416
  • [Android] ItemsUpdatingScrollMode in CarouselView Not Working as expected #29415
    Backlog
  • [Android] Loaded event not triggered when navigating back to a previous page #29414
    Backlog
  • App Hangs when Orientation Changes During Photo Taking Using MediaPicker #29413
    Backlog
  • [Windows] CarouselView.Loop property cannot be Dynamically changed #29412
    Backlog
  • [Android] CarouselView.Loop = false causes crash on Android when changed at runtime #29411
    Backlog

Closed

  • App crash after navigating back and forth to a page with many UI elements #24008

PullRequests

Created

  • Inflight/current #29426
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView Dynamic changes #29424
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] - Enabled Test 29402 to Pass on Both CV1 and CV2 Handlers #29423
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for exception thrown when disconnecting page handlers in the Unloaded event while navigating on MacCatalyst and iOS #29410
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview4] [ci] Push metadata rollbacks #29425
  • [iOS] Fixed the App crashes when navigating to a page containing a map more than once #29369
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-map, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Inheriting StatusBar and NavigationBar background colors on modal pages #28568
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-modal, .NET 9 SR8
  • Revert "[Android][NET 10] Fix: Ensure Image consumes touches properly #29363
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview4] Revert "[Android][NET 10] Fix: Ensure Image consumes touches properly #29419
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky test(ListViewViewCellBinding) in CI #29409
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview4] Revert "Remove InternalsVisibleTo for Toolkit" #29403
    .NET 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • [.Net10][Proposal]TabbedPage.PopToRootOnTabReselect property #28563
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, .NET 10 Planning
  • [.Net10][Proposal][Shell] Shell.PopToRootOnTabReselect property #28562
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 10 Planning
  • Add converters to DatePicker and TimePicker for DateOnly and TimeOnly #21989
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Optimize JS escaping #27528
    community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • [iOS] CollectionView2 - empty view - improvements2 #29154
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • Fixed a NullReferenceException when starting application with empty shell on Windows #28879
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed issue where group Header/Footer template was set to all items when IsGrouped was true for an ObservableCollection #29144
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed NullReferenceException when using x:Name with SolidColorBrush #28805
    area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR8
  • Fix ScrollToPosition.Center behavior in ScrollView on iOS and MacCatalyst #26825
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • Android Libraries Ecosystem Updates 20250502 #29331
  • Changes in provisioning to fix fails installing Appium on Linux #29105
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Publish new snapshots and diffs to a specific artifacts folder #27928
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for Shadows #27701
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [iOS] Fix for Flyout title is not broken over multiple lines when you rotate your screen. #29171
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for TabBar Navigation does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • [Testing] Add VerifyScreenshot method overrides to verify a specific element #27632
    do-not-merge, area-testing
  • [iOS] Fixed the Items are not displaying in CarouselView 2 #29397
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Label text cropping when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout with specified with request #29166
    community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix "PlatformView cannot be null here" Exception using VisualStates #27877
    t/bug, area-xaml, platform/windows 🪟
  • Refactored similar methods on Windows HybridWebView #28282
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Fixed improper rendering of ThumbimageSource in Slider #27472
    community ✨, area-controls-slider, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR8
  • [Testing] Changes in the UITests pipeline to respect UseProvisionator #29393
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • [iOS] Fixing #28912 by only hiding context buttons when user already stopped dragging the cell #28914
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Removing outdated menu items as Android can delete them after switching activities #28767
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Android] Fix: Modal Animation Repeats When Returning from Background #28538
    platform/android 🤖, area-core-lifecycle, community ✨, area-controls-modal, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR8
  • Fix for ItemSpacing value being retained when re-entering CollectionView with ItemsLayout set to vertical or horizontal list after navigating back. #29190
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - Grouped CollectionView items not rendered properly on Android, works on Windows #27847
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed VisualState Setters not working properly for CollectionView [Windows] #27230
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Picker Items are not Displaying on macOS platform #27535
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS/Mac] Fixed the Border Rendering issues in CollectionViewHandler2 #27801
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the span text disappeared in label when setting the font attribute on span and setting an implicit style for Label on content page #28851
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows, Mac] Fixed Disappearing event not triggered when closing a window with a modal page #29129
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-modal, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix Crash When Using FlyoutItem with DataTemplate and Binding #28683
    area-xaml, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for Automatic Flow Direction change in Graphics View #29392
    area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Window dimensions not updating after device orientation changes on iOS #29373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix fo setting an Entry's Keyboard to Date causes it to be interpreted as a password input #29344
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView ItemsSource Feature #29322
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS] Fix for CarouselView ItemSpacing property in ItemsLayout not working with CV2 #27056
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix: Prevent Duplicate MapSource Invocations on setting Image's Source to Local File Paths #28405
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, p/0, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR8
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
